alert.note: Alert for Cave Creek, New River; Fountain Hills, East Mesa; Mazatzal Mountains; New River Mesa; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Rio Verde, Salt River; Tonto Basin (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 4:01PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...Thunderstorm winds and potentially additional thunderstorms will impact portions of Gila, Maricopa and Pinal Counties through 500 PM MST... At 400 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles northeast of Cordes Lakes to 6 miles northwest of Horseshoe Reservoir to Sycamore Creek to near Tonto Basin to near Tonto National Monument. Movement was southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Scottsdale, Sugarloaf Mountain, Sycamore Creek, Ballantine Trailhead, Roosevelt, Round Valley, Sunflower, New River, Cave Creek, Carefree, Roosevelt Dam, Canyon Lake, Tonto National Monument, Goldfield Ranch, Four Peaks, Desert Mountain, Camp Creek, Apache Lake, Punkin Center and McDowell Mountain Park. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 17 near mile marker 241. AZ Route 87 between mile markers 195 and 229. AZ Route 188 between mile markers 237 and 266. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Cave Creek, New River; Fountain Hills, East Mesa; Mazatzal Mountains; New River Mesa; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Rio Verde, Salt River; Tonto Basin
